title: Brothers Beyond Blood
description: Can two young men who meet in a concentration camp become friends? But what if one of them is a prisoner and the other is his guard? Separately, they were doomed, but if they can find a way to work together, they just might be able to survive. This book takes place in the final days of Hitler’s regime and chronicles the relationship of two young men, boys actually, who are thrown together by their experiences in a Nazi concentration camp. This is a must for adult and young adult readers who are ready to face the realities of World War Two. It’s available as a Kindle download and in paper form.
author: Don Kafrissen
